unnormalised: Regarding your query about train timings, the Howrah Rajdhani Express is scheduled to depart New Delhi at 16:50 hrs and arrive at Howrah Jn. at 10:20 hrs the following day. Please note that on 25/12/2024, due to scheduled maintenance, there might be a delay of approximately 1 hr. Confirm your journey details closer to the date on IRCTC for updated info. Also, note that the Kolkata Mail usually arrives at 06:00 AM but on certain days, particularly during monsoon season, it can be delayed by up to 2 hrs.
normalised: Regarding your query about train timings, the Howrah Rajdhani Express is scheduled to depart New Delhi at sixteen fifty hours and arrive at Howrah Junction at ten twenty hours the following day. Please note that on twenty fifth December two thousand and twenty four, due to scheduled maintenance, there might be a delay of approximately one hour. Confirm your journey details closer to the date on I-R-C-T-C for updated info. Also, note that the Kolkata Mail usually arrives at six A-M but on certain days, particularly during monsoon season, it can be delayed by up to two hours.
